attributes.action: Stop Sadiq Khan's Greater London ULEZ expansion plan
attributes.additional_details:
Currently, the ULEZ charge is only imposed in the Congestion Charge zone and up to the North and South Circular roads. If the Mayor's plan goes ahead, it will cover the whole of Greater London.

Sign the petition. Share it with a friend. Stop Sadiq Khan's new tax.

Stop Sadiq Khan's Greater London ULEZ expansion plan

Sign this petition to stop Sadiq Khan's
Greater London ULEZ expansion plan
attributes.background:
Household bills rising due to inflation and global supply problems, the Mayor's plan will hit the poorest in our community hardest.

Signing the petition below will help stop the Mayor's plan by showing the level of opposition to the expansion of ULEZ.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. It is the responsibility of the Mayor of London and the London Assembly.

The London Assembly has its own petitions process. You can find out more about how to petition the London Assembly here:
https://www.london.gov.uk/about-us/london-assembly/petitions

We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Revoke local government powers to charge CAZ, LEZ, and ULEZ https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/599985
